context: Uber went public in 2019 and faced pandemic challenges in 2020 as ride-hailing demand collapsed. The company pivoted focus to Uber Eats delivery, which saw massive growth. Acquired Postmates for $2.65B.

competitors.name: Lyft
competitors.notes: US ride-hailing competitor also struggling with pandemic impact

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Food delivery competitor that surpassed Uber Eats in US market share

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Food delivery competitor acquired by Just Eat Takeaway

competitors.name: Didi
competitors.notes: Chinese ride-hailing giant with global ambitions

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery competing for drivers and consumer attention
